contact.hereToHelp: We're here to help bring your vision to life
contact.subject: Subject
contact.thankYouResponse: Thank you! We'll get back to you within 24 hours.
contact.faqDesignConsultationAnswer: Yes! Our expert designers are available for both in-person and virtual consultations. Book an appointment to discuss your project.
contact.faqReturnPolicyAnswer: We offer a 30-day return policy on most items. Products must be in original condition with all packaging.
contact.faqShipInternationallyAnswer: Yes, we ship to over 50 countries worldwide. Shipping costs and delivery times vary by location.

help.findAnswers: Find answers to common questions or contact our support team
help.didntFind: Didn't find what you're looking for?
help.customerSupport247: Our customer support team is available 24/7 to assist you

faq.shippingTimeAnswer: Standard shipping takes 5-7 business days. Express shipping (2-3 business days) and overnight options are also available at checkout.
faq.shipInternationallyAnswer: Yes! We ship to over 50 countries worldwide. International shipping times vary by location, typically 7-14 business days. Customs duties may apply.
faq.trackOrderAnswer: Absolutely! Once your order ships, you'll receive a tracking number via email. You can also track your order from your account dashboard.
faq.damagedItem: What if my item arrives damaged?
faq.damagedItemAnswer: We're sorry if that happens! Contact us within 48 hours with photos of the damage, and we'll arrange a replacement or full refund immediately.
faq.returnPolicyAnswer: We offer a 30-day return policy for most items. Products must be in original condition with all packaging and tags intact.
faq.initiateReturn: How do I initiate a return?
faq.initiateReturnAnswer: Log into your account, go to your order history, and select "Return Item". Follow the prompts to print your prepaid return label.
faq.freeReturnsAnswer: Yes! We provide free return shipping on all domestic orders. International returns may require shipping fees.
faq.refundTime: How long does it take to receive my refund?
faq.refundTimeAnswer: Once we receive your return, refunds are processed within 3-5 business days. The funds will appear in your original payment method.
faq.authenticAnswer: Yes, 100%! We source directly from authorized manufacturers and distributors. Every item comes with a certificate of authenticity.
faq.priceMatchAnswer: Yes, we offer price matching on identical items from authorized retailers. Contact our support team with proof of the lower price.
faq.notifyRestock: Can I get notified when an out-of-stock item is available?
faq.notifyRestockAnswer: Absolutely! Click "Notify Me" on any product page, and we'll email you as soon as it's back in stock.
faq.giftWrappingAnswer: Yes! Select the gift wrapping option at checkout for $15. We'll include a personalized message card and premium packaging.
faq.paymentSafe: Is it safe to save my payment information?
faq.paymentSafeAnswer: Yes! We use industry-standard encryption (SSL) to protect your data. Your payment information is securely stored and never shared.
faq.paymentMethods: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.paymentMethodsAnswer: We accept Visa, Mastercard, American Express, PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and Affirm for financing options.
faq.resetPassword: How do I reset my password?
faq.resetPasswordAnswer: Click "Forgot Password" on the login page. Enter your email, and we'll send you a secure link to reset your password.
faq.changeAddress: Can I change my shipping address after ordering?
faq.changeAddressAnswer: If your order hasn't shipped yet, you can update the address in your account. Contact support immediately if you need help.

about.missionText1: At Luxury, we believe that your home should be a reflection of your unique style and aspirations. Our mission is to provide exceptional furniture and decor that transforms living spaces into extraordinary sanctuaries.
about.missionText2: Every piece in our collection is carefully curated with meticulous attention to detail, quality craftsmanship, and timeless design. We partner with world-renowned designers and artisans to bring you furniture that stands the test of time.
about.valuesPrinciples: The principles that guide everything we do
about.qualityFirstDesc: We never compromise on quality. Every product undergoes rigorous quality control to ensure it meets our exacting standards.
about.sustainableDesignDesc: We are committed to sustainability, using eco-friendly materials and ethical manufacturing practices.
about.customerDelightDesc: Your satisfaction is our priority. From browsing to delivery, we ensure an exceptional experience at every touchpoint.
about.teamSubtitle: Passionate experts dedicated to your perfect space

track.faqQuestion1: Where can I find my tracking number?
track.faqAnswer1: Your tracking number is included in your order confirmation email and is also available in your order history.
track.faqQuestion2: How often is tracking information updated?
track.faqAnswer2: Tracking information is updated in real-time as your package moves through our delivery network.
track.faqQuestion3: What if my tracking number doesn't work?
track.faqAnswer3: If your tracking number isn't working, please check that you've entered it correctly. If the problem persists, contact our customer support team.
